title: OPEN HEART UNIVERSITY
description: Following the bestselling Small Sreams of a Scorpion comes this second collection of the poems of Spike Milligan.'Somewhere inside the Goon, a small-sized William Blake is always struggling to get out and make himself heard' - Punch'Compassionate, perceptive, outraged and tender' - Evening News'Remarkably accomplished...lyrical, touching, sad, wise and wryly funy' - Sunday Express
author: Spike Milligan
